title: 5Wire
description: Full-stack music application that allows the user to create and save their own playlists. Group project using HTML, CSS, BootStrap JavaScript, Spotify API, and MongoDB, deployed on Heroku.

title: Eat the Burger
description: Full-stack application that allows you to create a burger, eat it, and delete it. Created using HTML, CSS, BootStrap, JavaScript, and MySQL, deployed on Heroku.

title: Weather App
description: Front-end weather application that pulls weather data by location. Created with HTML, CSS, BootStrap, JavaScript, and Open Weathermap API.

title: Password Generator
description: A simple password generator with prompts written in javascript that generates a password based on the user's responses to the prompts.
